I apologise if this causes offense, but I had to post it once I saw it
 
 http://www.godlessgeeks.com/LINKS/GodProof.htm
 
 I reckon creationists go there and choose a number at random to decide which refutation they'll try.
 
 http://www.jhuger.com/kisshankbutt.php
 
 This is one of the best parodies I've seen. I personally think it's hilarious. Maybe it belongs in another area, but I know some people here will appreciate it.
 
 I have yet to understand the mindset of a creationist. I mean there are holes in thier arguments big enough to drop a sun through, yet they can't see them. Maybe this parody will help them to see (although it'll probably just get me blasted).

Should probably be moved to the Religion board, but thanks for the links. Indeed, the second one's pretty funny, though it almost seemed as if the author was thinking up of various links to the real issue while he was writing the story.
LOL, the second one is hilarious.

 ARGUMENT FROM C.S. LEWIS
 (1) C.S. Lewis had a lot of good arguments in favor of Christianity ... at least that's what all my Christian friends tell me...
 (2) C.S. Lewis wrote some popular books too!
 (3) So anything C.S. Lewis said must be right!
 (4) Therefore, God Exists.
 
 How about ARGUMENT FROM DAN BROWN?
 [Edit: Even better, how about ARGUMENT FROM DARWIN?]
 
 Great sites.
